entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Grand Manan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:34 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grand Manan 09:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: -6.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: -8.6°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening except rain along parts of the coast this evening and after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 22 January 2023
